dcterms:description: Dataset utilized for implementing Comprehensive Learning Particle Swarm Optimization (CLPSO) for optimizing parameters in speech processing.

dcterms:description: Dataset providing a measure for short-time objective intelligibility of noisy speech, used to evaluate the effectiveness of speech intelligibility improvements.
dcterms:title: Short-Time Objective Intelligibility (STOI)
